subject: Redirect requested but followRedirects is disabled
msgSnippet: Hi, I am getting the following error on using HtmlUnit. I tried searching for a solution but I couldnt. It would be great if you could provide me an how-to
messageBody:
Hi,

I am getting the following error on using HtmlUnit. I
tried searching for a solution but I couldnt. It would
be great if you could provide me an "how-to" to solve
this issue.


Sep 23, 2005 12:25:27 AM
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector
isRedirectNeeded
INFO: Redirect requested but followRedirects is
disabled

INFO: statusCode=[501] contentType=[text/html]

<HTML><HEAD><TITLE>501 Not
Implemented</TITLE></HEAD><BODY><H1>501 Not
Implemented</H1>Unable to process request. Please
check the log file for more details.</BODY></HTML>
